feudal_hierarchy.description: Structured power relationships with clear chains of authority and obligation
feudal_hierarchy.trading_application: Understanding market power structures, institutional flows

magna_carta.description: Rule of law constraining even sovereign power - foundational constitutional principles
magna_carta.trading_application: Regulatory frameworks, compliance as market structure

crusader_logistics.description: Complex supply chains and resource management across vast distances
crusader_logistics.trading_application: Global market connectivity, supply chain analysis

dynastic_succession.description: Power transfer through bloodlines, legitimacy, and strategic marriage

guild_system.description: Craft guilds controlling quality, training, and market access
guild_system.trading_insight: Professional networks, barriers to entry, quality control

fair_courts.description: Merchant courts at fairs resolving disputes quickly for trade continuity

wool_trade.description: English wool as medieval Europe's most valuable commodity

coinage.description: Sterling silver standard establishing trusted currency

longbow_doctrine.description: English longbow dominance through training, discipline, massed fire
longbow_doctrine.trading_application: Concentrated force at key moments, range advantage

chevauchee.description: Rapid mounted raids destroying enemy economic capacity

common_law.description: Precedent-based legal system evolving through judicial decisions
common_law.trading_insight: Historical patterns as guides, case-based reasoning

parliament.description: Representative assembly constraining royal power, controlling taxation

exchequer.description: Sophisticated royal treasury and accounting system

key_figures.henry_ii: Legal reformer, common law architect, Angevin Empire builder
key_figures.richard_i: Crusader king, chivalric ideal, military excellence
key_figures.john_i: Magna Carta catalyst, administrative innovation through crisis
key_figures.edward_iii: Hundred Years' War initiator, Order of the Garter
